entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is introduced as a person who is eager to declare his love for Romilda Vane. He is described as crashing back to the floor and then bounding to his feet again.

entities.name: romilda vane
entities.description: Romilda Vane is introduced as a person who Ron wants to declare his love for. She has extra Potions lessons with Slughorn.

entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: Slughorn is introduced as a person who teaches Potions and gives extra lessons to Romilda Vane.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as a person who is thinking fast and inventing wildly to come up with an excuse for Ron to meet Romilda Vane.

relationships.description: Ron has a romantic interest in Romilda Vane, as he wants to declare his love for her.
Harry knows Slughorn, as he is leading the way to Slughorn's office where Romilda Vane has extra Potions lessons.
Ron is helped by Harry in coming up with an excuse for him to meet Romilda Vane.
